emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of men, one wearing light colored button down collared shirt with short sleeves, and apron, holding up package with right hand and holding money in his left, and women standing around the meat counter of the New Diamond Market
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 12, reads: "New Diamond Market -Shown in top photo is a portion of the crowd that flocks to the New Diamond Market, 211 Diamond Street, every week-end for tremendous savings on food values...The management of the New Diamond Market welcomes you to share in their giant twenty-fifth anniversary celebration beginning Friday, Oct. 21, through Dec. 6 - Harris Photo."
